name: Kentucky State University Center for Adult Learning
description: Center dedicated to providing quality education and accessible services for adult learners. Offers online degree programs and comprehensive wrap-around services to help non-traditional students balance education with work and family responsibilities. Provides support for Project Graduate students and credit for life experience programs.
notes: Part of Kentucky State University's Academic Affairs division. Serves adult learners seeking to complete degrees or advance their education. Offers Project Graduate program for students with 30+ credit hours (associate) or 80+ credit hours (bachelor's) who have been out of college for at least 2 years.
